GCC 4.4.0
 
 Getting gcc to work required a bit of work. I have written 2 nice scripts that do most of the hard work, terminal-gcc and terminal-g++.
 
 C works, but C++ support is 'patchy' in the NDK, but atleast classes work.
 
 You will need to 'install_gcc' but this is all explained in the tutorials. READ ALL the java tutorials too, as they show how vim works.
 
 So - READ ALL THE TUTORIALS! - they show how it all sticks together..
